1401.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|87|46$كَانَ|is|57|86|913$هَـٰذَا|this|59|88|248$ٱلْقُرْءَانُ|the Quran,|95|124|1595$أَن|that|48|77|655$يُفْتَرَىٰ|(it could be) produced|168|197|8151$مِن|by|50|65|53$دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|other than Allah,|131|146|8152$وَلَـٰكِن|but|78|108|108$تَصْدِيقَ|(it is) a confirmation|155|185|8153$ٱلَّذِى|(of that) which|121|151|138$بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ|(was) before it|119|134|920$وَتَفْصِيلَ|and a detailed explanation|194|209|8154$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book,|113|143|811$لَا|(there is) no|103|133|30$رَيْبَ|doubt|67|97|31$فِيهِ|in it,|50|80|32$مِن|from|50|65|53$رَّبِّ|(the) Lord|87|319|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|356|8$

1403.verse: بَلْ|Nay,|50|59|848$كَذَّبُواْ|they denied|98|115|2650$بِمَا|what|53|70|43$لَمْ|not|42|59|63$يُحِيطُواْ|they could encompass|168|185|8156$بِعِلْمِهِۦ|(of) its knowledge|140|157|4658$وَلَمَّا|and not|71|80|852$يَأْتِهِمْ|has come (to) them|152|164|6972$تَأْوِيلُهُۥ‌ۚ|its interpretation.|136|159|6444$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|100|702$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|90|5487$ٱلَّذِينَ|those|70|93|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ‌ۖ|before them,|107|119|1094$فَٱنظُرْ|then see|79|108|2332$كَيْفَ|how|66|124|288$كَانَ|was|57|115|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|141|3299$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|(of) the wrongdoers.|158|187|377$

1404.verse: وَمِنْهُم|And of them|101|110|745$مَّن|(is one) who|103|120|76$يُؤْمِنُ|believes|73|90|2051$بِهِۦ|in it,|52|69|204$وَمِنْهُم|and of them|100|117|745$مَّن|(is one) who|103|120|76$لَّا|(does) not|90|99|30$يُؤْمِنُ|believe|72|95|2051$بِهِۦ‌ۚ|in it.|52|98|204$وَرَبُّكَ|And your Lord|112|158|4866$أَعْلَمُ|(is) All-Knower|117|163|324$بِٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ|of the corrupters.|138|161|2960$

1406.verse: وَمِنْهُم|And among them|131|154|745$مَّن|(are some) who|124|169|76$يَسْتَمِعُونَ|listen|110|155|8161$إِلَيْكَ‌ۚ|to you.|68|113|45$أَفَأَنتَ|But (can) you|112|134|8162$تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ|cause the deaf to hear|173|189|8163$وَلَوْ|even though|103|134|179$كَانُواْ|they [were]|99|130|94$لَا|(do) not|75|106|30$يَعْقِلُونَ|use reason?|99|115|1435$

1398.verse: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who begins creation and then repeats it?" Say, "Allah begins creation and then repeats it, so how are you deluded?"

1399.verse: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who guides to the truth?" Say, "Allah guides to the truth. So is He who guides to the truth more worthy to be followed or he who guides not unless he is guided? Then what is [wrong] with you - how do you judge?"

1400.verse: And most of them follow not except assumption. Indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.

1401.verse: And it was not [possible] for this Qur'an to be produced by other than Allah, but [it is] a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of the [former] Scripture, about which there is no doubt, from the Lord of the worlds.

1402.verse: Or do they say [about the Prophet], "He invented it?" Say, "Then bring forth a surah like it and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."

1403.verse: Rather, they have denied that which they encompass not in knowledge and whose interpretation has not yet come to them. Thus did those before them deny. Then observe how was the end of the wrongdoers.

1404.verse: And of them are those who believe in it, and of them are those who do not believe in it. And your Lord is most knowing of the corrupters

1405.verse: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad], then say, "For me are my deeds, and for you are your deeds. You are disassociated from what I do, and I am disassociated from what you do."

1406.verse: And among them are those who listen to you. But can you cause the deaf to hear, although they will not use reason?
